/config.description: Choose a Share for Organizr configuration. Eg: create a Share called organizr-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run Organizr with. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID
